channel.title: M5stickV on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in M5stickV on Memo Tut

item.title: [Python] Switch and use multiple models with M5StickV
item.description: This article is the 3rd day of M5 Stack Advent Calendar 2019 Currently, for those who are blind, there are various apps (https://www.tokyo-itcenter.com/700link/sm-iphon4.html#iphone-10-00200). However, there seems to be no one that can be used, for example, to register (the pattern of) the plastic bottle of tea that you want to drink and recognize it. To check what you have registered, you can use hardware such as Oakham My Eye 2, but the price is hundreds of thousands.
